programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

Earthrise: The First Lunar Voyage, 20130101080000 +0000, Interviews with Apollo 8 astronauts, their wives, mission control staff, and journalists give true insider's perspective to the space race of the late 1960's.

How to Colonize the Stars, 20090101080000 +0000, Leading physicists and engineers in the field of interstellar travel discuss some of the deep issues we face when considering the problem of sending spacecraft to other stars. Will mankind ever truly become a space fairing civilization?

programme.title: The Mystery of the Milky Way

This episode also looks at recent missions, including the Herschel Space Observatory's examination of the Milky Wa

programme.title: The Ever Expanding Universe

In the Shadow of the Moon, 20070101080000 +0000, Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

programme.category: Science fiction, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series

programme.title: Bump In The Night/Hitchhike To Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E24, A woman who takes down the license plate number of a car that had been following her helps police solve the murder of another young woman.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Little Girl Lost
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E01, Halloween in a small town is canceled indefinitely when a young girl is kidnapped and killed on her way home from a costume party.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E17, In Rhode Island, policewomen go undercover as streetwalkers to nab the man suspected of murdering three prostitutes. And a dagger-shaped letter opener is the key piece of evidence that links a priest to the grisly 1980 murder of a nun in Ohio.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E21, A North Carolina man looking to clear his conscience gives police the information they need to solve a murder. And Indiana police are baffled by the murder of an 86-year-old woman, found dead in her bedroom.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Sweethearts, Silenced
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E04, A killer authors a book about his con-man past that becomes the key to solving a 29-year-old cold case of two high school sweethearts--and three other cold case murders--leading police to believe he could be the Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: A Budding Romance
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E01, Hallmark Original Series. The whole town anxiously awaits the impending blooming of the Middleton.

programme.title: Without Magic for a Spell
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E02, Hallmark Original Series. The Middleton Merriwick is still not in bloom.

programme.title: Day After Day
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E03, Hallmark Original Series. Two guests arrive at Grey House and are immediately at odds.

programme.title: How to Say 'I Love You!'
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E04, Hallmark Original Series. The town is caught up in romance when Cassie helps Ben find an old film.

programme.title: The Fifth Man
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E04, When the SG-1 team reports in from a brutal mission, they discover that their fifth team member -- Lt. Tyler -- may not actually have been real. Does this mean the end of the Stargate Program? If the Pentagon's Col. Simmons has his way, it will.

programme.title: Red Sky
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E05, The SG-1 team is welcomed on K'Tau by the planet's religious leader, who takes the reddening sky concurrent with their arrival as a sign from their gods. What he doesn't know is that the reddish color is signaling the planet's impending doom!

programme.title: Rite Of Passage
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E06, On the eve of her birthday, Cassandra is showing signs of mind fire, a powerful electromagnetic field triggered at puberty. Now SG-1 must find a cure to stop the life-threatening changes before she destroys herself…and the command center!

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E11, The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Epiphany
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E12, The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Critical Mass
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E13, The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Grace Under Pressure
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E14, While testing a newly repaired puddle jumper, McKay and Captain Hugh Griffin suddenly lose control of the ship and crash into the ocean. As the jumper begins to sink slowly towards the bottom of the ocean, Griffin sacrifices himself to save McKay.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E15, Sheppard and the team discover a world that has technology created by the Ancients. But the planet's royal family does not allow anyone but them to harness the technology and treat the villagers with little dignity.

programme.title: The Long Goodbye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E16, The team discover two life pods floating in space. Upon further investigation, the team accidentally transfers the minds of the individuals into Sheppard and Weir. Things get worse when the team discovers the two people are out to destroy the other.

programme.title: Coup D'Etat
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E17, Col. Sheppard's team is urgently summoned to M1K-177, where Maj. Lorne's team has been attacked. When Sheppard and his unit arrive, however, all they find is a burned building containing charred bodies: presumably, Lorne and his men.

programme.title: Michael
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E18, Lt. Kenmore wakes up in the infirmary without his memory. He begins to think there is something wrong when his nightmares about being a Wraith seem to be more than real. His fears would be unfounded if not for the serum that turns Wraiths humans.

programme.title: Air (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E01, When a military research base is attacked, a small group of civilians and military personnel escape on a ship into deep space. But divisions emerge between those who want to attempt a return to Earth and those who want to remain aboard the Destiny.

programme.title: Air (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E02, After secretly contacting Homeworld Command, Dr. Rush (Robert Carlyle) claims that he has been placed in charge by Gen. O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and that there is no hope of returning to Earth. But his assertions are soon questioned.

programme.title: Air (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E03, With the air supply failing on the Destiny, a team disembarks to a desert-like planet in search of a mineral needed to scrub the ship's air of carbon dioxide. While one team presses on to find the vital mineral, the other has another goal in mind.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E04, The crew has been working throughout the night to try and determine why the ship’s power reserves are critically low. But when Destiny’s flight path towards a solar system reveals three planets, the entire crew hopes that one of them is habitable.

programme.title: Beast Of Burden
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E07, Daniel's Unas friend, Chaka (Dion Johnstone), is captured by a pre-industrial civilization that uses Unas as slaves. While attempting to free Chaka from this cruel regime, Daniel risks the safety of SG-1, and possibly the life of his friend.

programme.title: The Tomb
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E08, On a rescue mission to recover Russian soldiers believed missing in action on a previously undisclosed trip, the SG-1 team gets trapped in a Goa'uld tomb with a number of decomposed bodies…and a deadly alien monster with an appetite for human flesh!

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E10, The guys kidnap Dylan for his bachelor party. The girls throw a much wilder time for bride-to-be Toni.

programme.title: Offensive Interference
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E11, Donna makes the Rose Court, and her mother reveals her reasons for not supporting her in the pageant.

programme.title: Breast Side Up
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E12, Colin and Susan leave for New York to spend Thanksgiving with their families. The gang decides to spend the holiday together, and David invites his mother to join them.

programme.title: Courting
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E13, Joe rejects a plea bargain and decides to go to trial. The Associated Press picks up Brandon's story about the trial for nationwide syndication. Colin babysits for Erin while Kelly and David are at the trial.

programme.title: Fortunate Son
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E14, Donna fills in for Lisa at a convenience store. A young boy is caught stealing a teddy bear for his brother's birthday, but Donna covers for him. Brandon alienates Nat and Susan as he gets carried away during the After Dark's charity casino night.

programme.title: Angels We Have Heard on High
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E15, Cindy surprises Brandon by coming to visit for Christmas. Joe tries to keep an antsy Donna in suspense about her Christmas/birthday present.

programme.title: Fade In, Fade Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E17, Kelly's father swoops into town, and once again sweeps her off of her feet with promises of a relationship. Nat is reunited with an old-flame.

programme.title: Snowbound
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E18, Kelly takes refuge back with Colin, and ends up on a bender.

programme.title: Nancy's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E19, Susan is nominated for a college journalism award for her story about a girl's decision to have an abortion. Valerie arranges a meeting between Colin and a knowledgeable art buyer in the hopes of encouraging Colin to get clean and focus on his career.

programme.title: Flying
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E20, Valerie's really annoying friend Ginger returns to town. Clare and Donna confront Kelly after finding drugs in the apartment. Brandon, Steve and Joe accept Jonathan's invitation to go flying in biplanes.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E23, Brandon and Susan spend the weekend at her parents' house. Colin and Valerie's new relationship upsets David and Kelly. Joe's older brother Hank comes to town and tries to discourage him from undergoing surgery.

programme.title: Sail Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E17, Stephanie is recruiting lifeguards for the annual Sailing Regatta where they will compete against South Bay, and Neely is taking the competition very seriously. Meanwhile, Mitch finds out Joey has grandparents who want to care for her.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E18, Mitch and Caroline rescue a woman who gets amnesia falling off the pier and must find her father to help her recover her memories. CJ meets a wheelchair-bound man who’s determined to get wheelchair access across the beach to the water.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E19, The team is invited to Hawaii for a week to oversee new lifeguard techniques and relax a bit. Logan becomes obsessed with competing in a surfing competition. To avoid a curse, CJ and Stephanie must return a sacred lava rock to its original location.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E20, After Matt is stung by a poisonous fish, he and Mitch find a village where a young woman offers to help them, resulting in all three of them running from her jealous suitor. Logan’s selfish behavior puts his relationship with Caroline in jeopardy.

programme.title: Last Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E21, Kaye is reunited with old flame Wes Masters. Stephanie undergoes surgery for melanoma performed by her doctor and boyfriend Tom, who plans a romantic surprise for her when surgery is over. Caroline catches Logan cheating on her with Neely.

programme.title: Go for the Gold
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E22, While in search of underwater treasure, things take a deadly turn when Stephanie and Cody are confronted by a pair of drug smugglers. Back at headquarters, Newman faces off against a different type of treasure hunter…

programme.title: Shark Fever
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E01, Logan decides to write and direct a low-budget action flick at the beach using a drugged shark as the villain, but things get out of hand when the shark Is not properly sedated!

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E02, When Mitch Judges the Miss Malibu Beach Bikini Contest, his willpower is tested by two competitors who will do anything to get his vote. Later, Cody designs the "Windjet,” an innovative, new lifesaving boat/waverunner combination.

programme.title: Liquid Assets
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E03, CJ befriends Max, a homeless eccentric who claims that he was once a famous Hollywood Costume designer. When Max dies suddenly, CJ learns he was rich and has left her $4 million in his will. Manny joins junior lifeguards.

programme.title: Windswept
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E04, At the annual Baywatch Lifeguard Bachelor Auction, Mitch is "bought" for $5,000 by a wealthy socialite. The relationship gets complicated when they get stranded on an island and their social status is reversed. Cody joins a local roller hockey team.

programme.title: Scorcher
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E05, LA is in the throes of a severe heat wave! Hundreds of thousands of people head to the beach. Lifeguarding gets more chaotic for the team when the Secret Service shows up to inform them that the President is going to go jogging on the beach.

programme.title: Beachblast
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E06, To sponsor the Special Olympics at the beach, Mitch hires MTV DJ Jenny McCarthy to throw "Beachblast:" a live televised tournament. After being evicted from his apartment, Cody moves in with CJ and Caroline, creating a surplus of sexual tension.

programme.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E07, CJ's mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town seeking CJ's help to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend. When CJ and her mom are held hostage on a remote beach, it is up to Mitch and Cody to rescue them.

programme.title: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E08, Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E09, Controversy generated by Donna's appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards. When an earthquake triggers a rockslide, burying a bus full of junior lifeguards, Mitch, Samantha, Cody and Donna try to rescue them.

programme.title: Search and Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E10, After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Heal the Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E11, Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.
